title: D&AD-serif
content:
Does anyone know the serif used in D&AD’s ad on the right here? It’s also used in this vid: [http://awards.dandad.org/2010/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131024402/http:/awards.dandad.org/2010/ "http://awards.dandad.org/2010/")  
I really love those numerals.
author: frode frank
